title: Asian Stocks Drop After AI Jitters Hit Wall Street: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities retreated from a record as fresh concerns over the impact of artificial intelligence on various sectors pressured US technology stocks and spurred a flight to the safety of Treasuries.
content: Asian equities retreated from a record as fresh concerns over the impact of artificial intelligence on various sectors pressured US technology stocks and spurred a flight to the safety of Treasuries.
